process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_3" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_15</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_8" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="69" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_13</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_8"/>
    <bpmn:callActivity id="node_10" pm:color="#53a451" name="Data Connector" calledElement="data_source_callback-data_source_sub_process" pm:config="{"dataSource":2,"endpoint":"CreateRecord","dataMapping":[],"outboundConfig":[{"value":"{{form_input_1}}","type":"BODY","key":"ciDoctor","format":"mustache"},{"value":"{{form_input_2}}","type":"BODY","key":"nameDoctor","format":"mustache"},{"value":"Salgado","type":"BODY","key":"lastNameDoctor","format":"mustache"}],"callback":false,"callback_url":"callback_url","callback_variable":"callback","callback_methods":["POST"],"callback_data_types":["FORM"],"callback_authentication":null,"callback_authentication_username":"","callback_authentication_password":"","callback_whitelist":[]}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_13</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_15</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:callActivity>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_13" name="" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_10"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_15" name="" sourceRef="node_10" targetRef="node_3"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="180" y="110" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="580" y="110" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <dc:Bounds x="270" y="90" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="198" y="128"/>
        <di:waypoint x="328" y="128"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <dc:Bounds x="420" y="90" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <di:waypoint x="328" y="128"/>
        <di:waypoint x="478" y="128"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <di:waypoint x="478" y="128"/>
        <di:waypoint x="598" y="128"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
